mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFOES (USER_CODE, USER_ID, USER_TYPE, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_TEL, USER_BIRTH, USER_STATUS) VALUES (#{userCode}, #{userId}, ${userType}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userTelResult}, TO_DATE(#{userBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_CODE AS userCode, USER_ID AS userId, USER_TYPE AS userType, USER_PW AS userPw , USER_NAME AS userName, USER_TEL AS userTel, USER_BIRTH AS userBirth, USER_STATUS AS userStatus FROM USERINFOES WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw}
